# Erc1155 class

Standard ERC1155 NFT functions

## Example

```javascript
const contract = await sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
await contract.erc1155.transfer(walletAddress, tokenId, quantity);
```

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                                        | Modifiers | Description                                                 |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(contractWrapper, storage, chainId)](./sdk.erc1155._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Erc1155</code> class |

## Methods

| Method                                                                                                      | Modifiers | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [balance(tokenId)](./sdk.erc1155.balance.md)                                                                |           | Get NFT balance for the currently connected wallet                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [balanceOf(address, tokenId)](./sdk.erc1155.balanceof.md)                                                   |           | Get NFT balance of a specific wallet                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [get(tokenId)](./sdk.erc1155.get.md)                                                                        |           | Get a single NFT                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [getAddress()](./sdk.erc1155.getaddress.md)                                                                 |           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [getAll(queryParams)](./sdk.erc1155.getall.md)                                                              |           | Get all NFTs                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [getClaimTransaction(destinationAddress, tokenId, quantity, options)](./sdk.erc1155.getclaimtransaction.md) |           | Construct a claim transaction without executing it. This is useful for estimating the gas cost of a claim transaction, overriding transaction options and having fine grained control over the transaction execution. |
| [getMintTransaction(receiver, metadataWithSupply)](./sdk.erc1155.getminttransaction.md)                     |           | Construct a mint transaction without executing it. This is useful for estimating the gas cost of a mint transaction, overriding transaction options and having fine grained control over the transaction execution.   |
| [getOwned(walletAddress)](./sdk.erc1155.getowned.md)                                                        |           | Get all NFTs owned by a specific wallet                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [isApproved(address, operator)](./sdk.erc1155.isapproved.md)                                                |           | Get whether this wallet has approved transfers from the given operator                                                                                                                                                |
| [totalCirculatingSupply(tokenId)](./sdk.erc1155.totalcirculatingsupply.md)                                  |           | Get the total supply of a specific NFT                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [totalCount()](./sdk.erc1155.totalcount.md)                                                                 |           | Get the total number of NFTs minted                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [totalSupply(tokenId)](./sdk.erc1155.totalsupply.md)                                                        |           | Get the total supply of a specific token                                                                                                                                                                              |

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Erc1155<T extends DropERC1155 | TokenERC1155 | BaseERC1155 = BaseERC1155 | BaseSignatureMintERC1155> implements UpdateableNetwork, DetectableFeature
```

**Implements:** UpdateableNetwork, DetectableFeature

## Remarks

Basic functionality for a ERC1155 contract that handles IPFS storage for you.
